title: 3 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment! Must see!
posting_body: 1500 Brandon Glen Way NE, Conyers, GA, 30012
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1234 Sq.
Welcome home to a comfortable community with beautiful apartment homes for rent in Conyers, GA.
At Flats at 1500, we're excited to offer one-, two-, and three-bedroom floor plans.
Take advantage of large closets, a patio or balcony, and additional storage space — but that's not all!
Some of our community amenities include a swimming pool with sundeck, laundry facilities, and a playground.
Curious about what's nearby the community?
You'll find that Flats at 1500 is minutes away from I-20, providing direct access to major employers, universities, and downtown Atlanta.
Schedule a tour today to see your new home in Conyers, GA.
Please see the office for fees & other details!
